timeline.message: brought up to date with previous progress
finished simple cases for token generation
factored out placeholder generation into a function

timeline.bodyText: Instead of create another hashset for generating a random, can we use the schema.keyset to get a random instead?
timeline.author: Bei-z

replies.bodyText: The method picks a random column of a specific datatype (the parameter is datatype). So I go through the entire schema first and find the column names that contain data of type datatype. I also added another getRandomColumn method that just picks a random column and it uses schema.keySet() directly.
replies.author: AllenWang314

replies.bodyText: Thank you for the explanation. Then let's use an array instead of a hashset to get the random.
replies.author: Bei-z

timeline.message: made changes to address PR comments
changed parameter and return type in generateRandomElement
